result.title: mCT measurements in cavitating orifice
result.description: Cavitation volume fraction on the same nozzle using mCT. The simulation projects will be using the validated computational in-nozzle flow model for predicting realistic conditions of liquid, gas and vapour compositions realised during the transient operation of injectors.
